attributes.additional_details: While pregnant and on maternity you would normally get an Maternity Exemption Certificate for dental treatment. However this has been unable to happen.
attributes.background:
I would like the Maternity Exemption Certificate
To be extended for dental treatment for women who are currently pregnant or on maternity leave

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324340
